channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Whole of Ukraine Is Ours,’ Putin Muses Without Ruling Out Capturing Key City
item.description: Moscow has hoped to mend relations with the United States while continuing to wage war in Ukraine, but Mr. Putin’s insistence on pushing his offensive...

item.title: Why is caregiving so hard in America? The answers emerge in a new film
item.description: A new documentary on PBS shows what it's like to care for adult family members and recounts the history of caregiving policy in the U.S., revealing wh...

item.title: Mahmoud Khalil Must Be Released on Bail, Federal Judge Orders
item.description: Mr. Khalil, a Columbia graduate and legal permanent resident, has been held in Louisiana for over three months. The judge found reason to believe it w...

item.title: Judge orders release of Columbia activist Mahmoud Khalil
item.description: Khalil will be released on bail while his case challenging his deportation orders plays out in the courts.

item.title: A cancer center in Jordan treats kids from Gaza, but only a few dozen have arrived
item.description: Children from Gaza with cancer are finally making it to Jordan for long-promised treatment. But a plan to allow as many as 2,000 patients out of the w...

item.title: $40 Million Yacht That Mysteriously Sank Is Raised From Bottom of Sea
item.description: Investigators are hoping to find clues as to why the Bayesian superyacht sank off the coast of Sicily 10 months ago, killing seven people.

item.title: Court backs Trump's control of National Guard. And, the latest on the Israel-Iran war

item.title: What children in poverty could lose from the 'Big Beautiful Bill'

item.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’s Ex-Assistant Says Mogul Told Staff to ‘Move Like SEAL Team 6’
item.description: Brendan Paul testified that his duties for Sean Combs involved getting drugs, setting up hotel rooms for sexual encounters and handling routine tasks.

item.title: How Vera Rubin Telescope Scientists Will Deal With 60 Million Billion Bytes of Imagery
item.description: The Vera C. Rubin Observatory will make the study of stars and galaxies more like the big data-sorting exercises of contemporary genetics and particle...

item.title: Live Updates: E.U. Talks With Iran Yield No Breakthrough

item.title: 2 Hikers Dead, 3 Others Injured After Rockslide in Canada’s Banff National Park
item.description: The hikers were struck by a cascade of sliding rocks on Thursday while traveling along a moderately difficult trail.
